about.name: Stalin Acurio
about.description: I'm excited to work on projects from scratch and see them run in a browser.

listProjectComplete.title: Fylo
listProjectComplete.description: Cloud services website presenting services and testimonials, with a built-in module for entering and validating email addresses.

listProjectComplete.title: Advice Generator Application
listProjectComplete.description: Website in which clicking on the green icon generates a random tip through an API call.

listProjectComplete.title: Crowdfunding
listProjectComplete.description: Page to raise funds through campaigns. With it, you can visualize the progress of the goal and the participation of supporters in real time.

listProjectComplete.title: Sunnyside
listProjectComplete.description: Website of a creative agency showcasing the agency's services, testimonials and designs.

listProjectComplete.title: Web portfolio template
listProjectComplete.description: Web developer portfolio with several sections, where projects are displayed filtered by categories and with a contact form.

listProjectComplete.title: Portfolio
listProjectComplete.description: My web portfolio where you will find my work and skills in design, development and technology, with examples of previous projects.

listProjectComplete.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors
listProjectComplete.description: Web site to play Rock, Paper, Scissors with a simple and easy to use interface.

listProjectComplete.title: Space Turism
listProjectComplete.description: The space tourism website provides detailed information about the destinations, crew and advanced technology employed on each interstellar voyage.

listProjectComplete.title: GalloExpre C.A.
listProjectComplete.description: I carried out the development of this project with the objective of optimizing the performance of the original page. In addition, we opted for a minimalist and functional design to modernize the appearance of the page.

listProjectComplete.title: Hydra
listProjectComplete.description: I developed this website following a design provided by Zine, including effects that create a virtual reality experience.

listProjectComponents.title: Interactive card details
listProjectComponents.description: Component to enter credit card information and display its update in real time.

listProjectComponents.title: Expense chart
listProjectComponents.description: Component showing a graph of the previous week's expenditures.

listProjectComponents.title: NFT card
listProjectComponents.description: Chart component to display information from an NFT.
